exhibition/text: Adult Day Care Center 'Kupalinka' invites creative people to take an active part in the exhibition-sale of hand made products (products of embroidery, knitting, sewing, costume jewelery, objects burning out on a tree, etc.)
exhibition/times: October 5th (Thursday): 12.00 pm - 6 pm,October 6th (Friday): 12.00 pm - 6 pm,October 7th (Saturday): 12.00 pm - 4 pm
